import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Eye, EyeOff, Box, Cloud, Code, GitBranch } from 'lucide-react'; const LoginPage = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [showPassword, setShowPassword] = useState(false); const [credentials, setCredentials] = useState({ email: '', password: '' }); const handleLogin = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (credentials.email === 'demo@opscanvas.dev' && credentials.password === 'demo123') { localStorage.setItem('isAuthenticated', 'true'); navigate('/dashboard'); } }; return (
